original_text: And Gaal the son of Ebed went out and stood in the entrance of the gate of the city, and Abimelech and the people who were with him rose from the ambush.
korean_text: 에벳의 아들 가알이 나와서 성읍 문 입구에 설 때에 아비멜렉과 그와 함께 있는 백성이 매복하였던 곳에서 일어난지라

sentences.original_text: And Gaal the son of Ebed went out
and stood in the entrance of the gate of the city
and Abimelech and the people who were with him
